snippet: North Korea has often threatened to strike the “heart” of the United States, but a warning issued on Tuesday was more detailed about its strategic rocket capabilities.
abstract: North Korea issues warning claiming that it has missiles that can reach the American mainland; adds that the recent agreement between the United States and South Korea to extend the range of the South’s ballistic missiles increases the risk of war on the Korean Peninsula.
lead_paragraph: North Korea has often threatened to strike the “heart” of the United States, but a warning issued on Tuesday was more detailed about its strategic rocket capabilities.

headline.seo: North Korea Says Missiles Can Reach U.S. Mainland
headline.main: North Korea Says Its Missiles Can Reach U.S. Mainland
headline.print_headline: North Korea Says Its Missiles Can Reach U.S. Mainland
